headline: Kennametal's Q2 Earnings & Revenues Top Estimates, Increase Y/Y
summary: KMT posts Q2 FY26 EPS of 47cents, up 89% y/y, as revenues rose 10% to $530M and margins expand, prompting higher full-year guidance.

headline: 3M Announces New Board Appointment
summary: 3M (NYSE: MMM) announced today the election of Neil G. Mitchill, Jr. to 3M's Board of Directors, effective Feb. 6, 2026. Mr. Mitchill also has been appointed as a member of the Audit Committee and the Nominating and Governance Committee of the Board.

headline: Brookfield Asset Management: The $1.2B Peakstone Acquisition Reinforces The Bull Case
summary: Brookfield Asset Management (BAM) rated a buy: 31% revenue growth, 15% dividend hike, $134B liquidity and Peakstone deal.
